contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}}{{Taxobox | name = | image = | status = DD | status_system = IUCN3.1 | status_ref = <ref>Bigirimana, C. 2006. ''[http://www.iucnredlist.org/details/60711/0 Xenotilapia spiloptera]''. In: IUCN 2012. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2012.2. <[http://www.iucnredlist.org www.iucnredlist.org]>. Downloaded on 12 June 2013.</ref> | regnum = [[Animalia]] | phylum = [[Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Perciformes]] | familia = [[Cichlidae]] | subfamilia = [[Pseudocrenilabrinae]] | tribus = [[Ectodini]] | genus = ''[[Xenotilapia]]'' | species = '''''X. spiloptera''''' | binomial = ''Xenotilapia spiloptera'' | binomial_authority = [[Max Poll|Poll]] & [[Donald J. Stewart|D. J. Stewart]], 1975 | synonyms = }} '''''Xenotilapia spiloptera''''' is a species of [[cichlid]] [[endemism|endemic]] to [[Lake Tanganyika]] where it prefers areas with sandy substrates. This species can reach a length of {{convert|9.6|cm|in}} [[fish measurement|TL]]. It can also be found in the [[aquarium]] trade.<ref>{{FishBase species |genus= Xenotilapia|species= spiloptera| month = April | year = 2013}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External Links== * [http://fishbase.org/Photos/PicturesSummary.php?ID=9181&what=species Photograph] {{Cichlidae-stub}} [[Category:Xenotilapia]] [[Category:Fauna of Burundi]] [[Category:Fauna of the Democratic Republic of the Congo]] [[Category:Fauna of Zambia]] [[Category:Fish of Tanzania]]
